name: 🏠 First-Time Home Buyer Program
description: Special rates and down payment assistance for first-time buyers. Get into your dream home with as little as 3.5% down!

name: 🎖️ VA Loans - 0% Down
description: Exclusive benefits for veterans and active military. No down payment required and competitive rates!

name: 💰 Refinancing - Lower Your Payment
description: Reduce your monthly payment or cash out equity. Free rate analysis in 60 seconds!

name: 📱 15-Minute Pre-Approval
description: Get pre-approved online in just 15 minutes. Know your buying power instantly!

name: 🏡 Jumbo Loans
description: Financing for luxury homes over $766,550. Competitive rates for high-value properties.
